sub_title: Chairman of the Board at FAR PROPERTIES
summary:
Worked in the aviation and petroleum sectors for government and private sector owned entities. Held senior positions in the two sectors, namely: Chief Executive Officer at the national airline and national oil company of Botswana (founding CEO). Also held Managing Director positions at Shell Namibia, a UK registered entity and Shell Oil Botswana. Held position of Government Relations Advisor Shell International based in the Haig, Netherlands responsible for Africa.

Skills include: Management, Finance, Marketing, Planning, Corporate Governance, Stakeholder Management gained in the Aviation and Petroleum sectors.

Read Bachelor of Commerce degree at the University of Botswana and Master of Science specializing in transport management at the University of Cranfield, Bedford in the United Kingdom.

Held various Board positions in various companies, including chairman of an entity listed in the stock exchange, National Development Bank, Botswana Development Corporation, Shell Namibia and Shell Oil Botswana.
